title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: PLE-Based Online Learning to Enhance Self-Regulated Learning (SRL)

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary online learning experience and intermediate-level social studies knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can create and implement personalized learning plans using a PLE (Personal Learning Environment) platform within 8 weeks.
Learners can achieve a weekly learning goal attainment rate of over 80% by the end of the course and generate self-assessment reports.
Learners can present improvement strategies for self-regulated learning by analyzing PLE platform data in the final project.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
